name: Assassins of Darkness
description:
A long time ago, after the death of Emperor Nakatomi Shigeaki without an heir, the Eastern Empire disintegrated and fell into turbulent times. The political power of the empire was held by a series of military dictators and feudal lords known as the Shoguns and Daimyos. The Shoguns and Daimyos slaughtered each other, leaving the once prosperous land in the region covered in blood for hundreds of years.

At the most crucial moment of the war, Sakura, an elite assassin of the Nagasawa clan, betrayed her clan. She sought the power of darkness from the Darkness Titan Kilgranuth with the desire to end the civil war and unite all the clans into a new empire under her rule.

Now, with the Dark Energy flowing in Sakura's veins. She is ready to slay everything she sees from the smallest harmless animals to the most powerful monsters from Inferno. She has to go through the most difficult challenges facing the fiercest monsters of hell in her journey. With diverse gameplay along with an engaging storyline, the game will not let you down with its vast and challenging exploration. Combined with a unique and exciting skill set, the game's combat system will immerse you in exciting battles with the fiercest and most powerful bosses.



FEATURES:


  • Intriguing Storyline.
  • Female Protagonist.
  • In-depth Battle System.
  • Beautiful Graphics.
  • Attractive Gameplay.
  • High Difficulty.
  • Diverse and Attractive Skill System.

Sakura - Dark Assassin

Sakura is an elite assassin of the Nagasawa clan specially trained to assassinate the heads of other clans. Born into a family of assassins, from a young age, she trained to become one of the greatest assassins. From the darkness, she appeared and attacked the enemy with a speed faster than the wind, causing the enemy to die without knowing what had happened. At the most crucial moment of the war, she was assigned by Nagasawa Eire to assassinate the head of the Kanagi clan, Risako. However, on the way to the mission, she realizes that assassinating Risako will only create more chaos for her hometown. So she sought the power of darkness from the Darkness Titan Kilgranuth with the desire to end the civil war and unite all the clans into a new empire under her rule.

Ruby - Magic Archer

Ruby is the talented disciple of Darkness Titan Kilgranuth. Hiding in the darkness, aiming at her enemies with precision, she fired arrows sharper than knives at a speed faster than the wind that pierced the weak hearts of her enemies. In addition to her superb archery skills, Ruby is also known as a reliable companion, ready to help her teammates when necessary. Receiving orders from Darkness Titan Kilgranuth, she and Sakura began to go to Inferno to test the energy that Sakura has just been bestowed.

Aezlisa - Succubus

Aezlisa was once a voluptuous woman that any man coveted. All the bravest warriors are willing to die to win her heart. However, hiding behind her beautiful exterior is a wicked soul. The strongest warriors after conquering her all had to pay the price with death. Realizing the wickedness in Aezlisa's soul, the demons of Inferno kidnapped her to Inferno to become their slave. Over time, she became one of Inferno's most lustful demons. However, she was tired of serving violent demons. She wanted to be the one to win the hearts of others, not to be a slave to these demons. So she is willing to do anything to be free and out of this Inferno.

Lilira - Dark Warrior

Lilira is the champion of Inferno. Since childhood, she has always been ridiculed by other warriors because of her huge breasts. However, instead of being embarrassed, she responded to the ridicule with punches that bruised their eyes. With her unrivaled strength, she proved to other warriors that women can fight just as well as men. Steadfast and brave, Lilira wanted something more out of life and left her home in search of something greater. She went around and won tournament after tournament, bringing in huge amounts of wealth and fame. Realizing the rare talent of Lilira, Darkness Titan Kilgranuth took her to Inferno to fight the most powerful monsters. No difficulty could stop her, all the most powerful monsters were defeated by her and she was honored to become the champion of Inferno.
